scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 3 && npm run start:backend
scripts.restartDev: npm run stop && sleep 3 && npm run start:dev
scripts.startAuto: npm run build && pm2 start api-backend
scripts.startAuto:backend: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only api-backend --env production
scripts.startAutoDev: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --env development
scripts.startAutoDev:backend: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only api-backend --env development
scripts.restartAuto: npm run build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.cjs --env production
scripts.restartAuto:backend: npm run build && pm2 restart api-backend
scripts.prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run start:backend
scripts.prod:bg: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production nohup npm run start:backend > logs/app.log 2>&1 &
